Messages.Win scatters and multipliers during Free: Win scatters and multipliers during Free Spin

Replaces all symbols except Bonus or Paint Splash.

Messages.3 or more symbols starts Balloon Bonus: 3+ Bonus symbols on consecutive reels from left to right awards Bonus.

Messages.Appears only on 1st reel during Free spi: Appears only on 1st reel during Free spins.

Messages.Appears only on 2nd reel during Free spi: Appears only on 2nd reel during Free spins.

Messages.Appears only on 4th reel during Free spi: Appears only on 4th reel during Free spins.

Messages.Appears only on 5th reel during Free spi: Appears only on 5th reel during Free spins.

Messages.Shoot as many ballons as you can, the wo: Pop as many ballons as you can, the word 'END' will terminate the bonus. The total bonus multiplier depends on the number of icons that triggered the bonus. See game guide for details.

Messages.You win by matching symbols on win lines: You win by matching symbols on win lines. All symbols must be matched on consecutive reels from left to right. Only the highest win on each line will be paid. Malfunction voids all pays and plays. See game rules for more details.
